QuestData.Title: Heart On Fire
QuestData.Description: We have the shards, but now they must be combined. There's a forge here, but even its fires aren't hot enough for our purposes.$B$BHowever, there is a demon nearby that burns hot as the sun.$B$BGul'dan, or perhaps Razuun, has managed to summon an infernal. The thing calls itself Krosnis, which means "furnace."$B$BThe demon's heart burns hotly enough. All you need do is collect it.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Slay the infernal and take its fiery heart.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect the Fiery Heart from Krosnis.
QuestData.CompletionText: With the combined might of the shards, we should be able to trap Gul'dan.
QuestData.RewardText: Quickly, place the heart in the forge. We'll use its infernal heat to forge the trap.
